name: Operation Hawkmoth
description:
Operation Hawkmoth is an action game where you have to move more than two units at once, Kill every enemy in the level to proceed to the next one and unlock new mercenaries. 
Use 'Q'+MouseRight to move your first unit and 'E'+MouseRight  to move your second unit, they will shoot every enemy in rage on their own.

Features:
- 20 levels
- 6 mercenaries
- Customizable key bindings
- 1 Bonus Level
- Some secret stuff you unlock after beating the game
